body: Oh, Yuuna. My dearest Yuuki Yuuna! I am glad that (probably) none of the "Yuuna Yuuki" tag doujinshi is tainted by a filthy tag called "ugly bastard" (coz my subjectively no 1 female character doesn't deserve that trait). Moreover, I am EVEN MORE GLAD that this doujin paired her with an ikemen! This pairing at the end of the story is so cute, my heart just gonna melt itself!
